page.title: 15ASTLEY VILLAGE
page.content: {ASTLEY VILLAGE} HAS GROWN AROUND AN OLD COLLIERY WHICH IS NOW BEING CONVERTED INTO A MUSEUM BY A CONSERVATION SOCIETY (RED ROSE STEAM SOCIETY). LITTLE TRAFFIC USES HIGHER GREEN LANE BECAUSE IT IS A DEAD END FINISHING AT{ASTLEY MOSS.}THE MAIN SHOP IN THE VILLAGE IS THE POST OFFICE. THERE ARE NOT MANY OTHER SHOPS BECAUSE THERE IS LITTLE DEMAND FOR OTHER SERVICES. THE NORTHERN BOUNDARY IS MARKED BY THE{EAST LANCS ROAD}WHICH LINKS{MANCHESTER }AND{LIVERPOOL}AND CARRIES LARGE VOLUMES OF TRAFFIC. RUNNING EAST-WEST ACROSS THE AREA IS THE{BRIDGEWATER CANAL},ORIGINALLY BUILT TO CARRY COAL FROM THE LOCAL COAL MINES TO THE PORTS. NOW THE COAL IS CARRIED BY RAIL AND THE CANAL HAS A LIMITED USE FOR CRUISING AND FISHING.
